txt.en: 'Welcome. Thou face now the final of the Huntsman's challenges.\n\n'Should thou prove keen of wit and wisdom, then thou shall pass -- but should thou falter now, then it may be that thy story ends here.'
'You have proven your wisdom, now leave whence you came before you become a part of our world forevermore.'
Instance: The Wild Hunt -- Arassiel's Spirit
As you lean down and drink from the pool, strange visions dance before your eyes, and the odd mist that had fallen upon the forest begins to lift.
You have chosen a deadly spirit
Brilliant spirit of Wisdom

'The test of Wisdom now lies before you. Listen carefully, Mortal.

'Five spirits stand before you. One is the spirit of Wisdom, the other four are spirits of Anger, Greed, Vengeance, and Fear. You must find the spirit of Wisdom among them -- but decide carefully for your choice is perilous.

'I can tell you but three things about these spirits: Firstly, you must know that Fear can be found directly to the right of Vengeance. Secondly, you must know that Anger is directly left of Greed. Lastly, the spirit of Wisdom cannot be found next to Greed, Anger, or Vengeance. Choose wisely....'
You have discovered the spirit of Wisdom
You have completed the test of Wisdom
Speak with the stag-spirit and confront its challenge.
The stag-spirit has been defeated
Accept the stag-spirit's challenge of wisdom.
The spirit of Wisdom has been defeated

Five spirits stand before you. One is the spirit of Wisdom, the other four are spirits of Anger, Greed, Vengeance, and Fear. You must find the spirit of Wisdom among them -- but decide carefully for your choice is perilous.

The stag-spirit told you this:

Firstly, you must know that Fear can be found directly to the right of Vengeance. Secondly, you must know that Anger is directly left of Greed. Lastly, the spirit of Wisdom cannot be found next to Greed, Anger, or Vengeance. Choose wisely.
After speaking with the Stag-spirit, you must drink from the strange pool to escape from this eerie realm of spirits.
Spirit of Fear
The spirit before you flares angrily!
Terrible spirit of Fear
Talk to the stag-spirit
Accept the stag-spirit's challenge
Spirit of Greed
Identify the spirit of Wisdom
The spirit advances with a terrible hunger!
Terrible spirit of Greed
Protect the stag-spirit
Protect the Spirit of Wisdom
Speak with the Stag-spirit
Spirit of Anger
Terrible spirit of Anger
The spirit before you glows warmly!
Spirit of Vengeance
Terrible spirit of Vengeance
An aura of fear emanates from the spirit before you!
You stand before an ancient spirit imbued with great wisdom. You must pass through its trial if you wish to gain the Huntsman's favour.
The spirit moves to exact vengeance upon you!
'Come.'
'Make your choice, mortal.'

'The test of Wisdom now lies before you. Listen carefully, Mortal.

'Five spirits stand before you. One is the spirit of Wisdom, the other four are spirits of Anger, Greed, Vengeance, and Fear. You must find the spirit of Wisdom among them -- but decide carefully, for your choice is perilous.

'I can tell you but three things about these spirits: Firstly, you must know that Fear can be found directly to the right of Vengeance. Secondly, you must know that Anger is directly left of Greed. Lastly, the spirit of Wisdom cannot be found next to Greed, Anger, or Vengeance. Choose wisely....'
